curam.util.ieg.intf
Interface IEGRuntime

All Known Implementing Classes:
curam.util.ieg.base.IEGRuntime
Direct Known Subclasses:
IEGRuntimeFactory
public class IEGRuntime
extends curam.util.ieg.base.IEGRuntime

Provides methods for the client to interact with IEG execution engine.

public ExecutionIdentifier createScript(ScriptIdentifier script)
                                 throws AppException,
                                        InformationalException
Creates a new script execution for the specified IEG script and return the execution id that identifies the script execution.

Parameters:
script - The ID of the script to start executing.
Returns:
